result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roger Donald Sullivan III

records.addlTxt: Order on Arraignment

8:55 AM Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III in court, in custody.  Attorney Paul A. Ksicinski Mr. appeared by phone for Roger Donald Sullivan III.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Anne Kunisch in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case initially called at 8:33am, Def. not present, but in our jail, recess for Def. to be brought over; Review of info is waived; not guilty plea entered; 30 days mtns; tsc set; bail con't
Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.
10-5-22 Notice of Hearing returned
Arraignment on October 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Acknowledgement by Person Posting Bail/Deposit

Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does. Payment of warrant fees in the amount of $50 by next court date.

12:47 PM Prosecuting attorney Kurt Frederich Klomberg in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Paul A. Ksicinski Mr. appeared by phone for Roger Donald Sullivan III. Atty. Ksicinski heard on Def.'s FTA, requests bond reinstated; State response, requests new cash bail of $1,000; Atty. Ksicinski response; Court orders new $500.00 Cash Bail (prior cash bail forfeited): Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does. Payment of warrant fees in the amount of $50 by next court date. PH 8/18/22 at 8:30am in Br. 1

Adjustment Number: 22A 090114,
Payable Number: 244913,
Receipt Number: 22R 013338,
Amount: $20.00
Extradition Forecast
8:25 AM Prosecuting attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III not in court. Court issues WA; PH removed from calendar.

8:54 AM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Anne Kunisch in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III in court. Defendant has not retained counsel. Discussion held. ADA Kunisch heard; requests witness fees. Court heard; orders witness fees and continues Prelim one last time; sets Review; notes this is LAST adjournment.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Review hearing scheduled for July 20, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Review hearing on July 20, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

8:45 AM Intern Marco Lewis w/Prosecuting attorney Jin Ho D. Pack in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III in court. Discussion held on status of counsel. Court heard; leaves on PH calendar, defendant states will have counsel by that date.

8:26 AM Prosecuting attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III in court. Discussion held on status of retaining private counsel. Discussion on time limits and scheduling. Defendant waives time limits to hire counsel. Court sets another Review Hearing; resets Prelim - notes will not adjourn again.
Review hearing scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Review hearing on June 22, 2022 at 08:15 am.

8:18 AM Prosecuting attorney Gilbert Grant Thompson in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III in court. Eligible for SPD, waiting on appointment. Defendant wants to retain private counsel, requests more time to hire. Discussion held. Court takes recess to allow defendant to complete petition for counsel.
8:49 AM Back on record. Appearances same. Discussion held. Defendant wishes to hire private counsel. Court sets Review.
Review hearing scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Review hearing on June 15, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does. The Jail shall permit Defendant to make a phone call at the county expense for bail purposes.

1:15 PM Prosecuting attorney Yolanda J. Tienstra in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alyssa F. George (eligible - has Atty Van Kirkvoorde in another matter) appeared by video for Roger Donald Sullivan III. Court takes short recess to allow complaint to be sent to DCJ for review.
1:34 PM Back on record, appearances same. Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges, penalties and right to Preliminary Hearing. Court finds probable cause. Prelim requested, within time limits. Prelim & Review set. Court sets $500 Cash bond with conditions: Defendant shall not use/possess/control any controlled substances (without a valid prescription therefore) or drug paraphernalia, nor be in the presence of anyone who does. The Jail shall permit Defendant to make a phone call at the county expense for bail purposes.
Extradition Forecast

10:38 AM Prosecuting attorney Robert G. Barrington in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Roger Donald Sullivan III not in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court. State requests warrant; Court authorizes warrant and finds probable cause.
